scripts.build: mkdir -p e2e/generated/basic && protoc --plugin="protoc-gen-ts=node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts" --js_out="import_style=commonjs,binary:e2e/generated/basic" --ts_out="e2e/generated/basic" e2e/protos/readinglist.proto && mkdir -p e2e/generated/BasicState && protoc -I. -I./e2e/protos -I./state/options.proto --plugin=./protoc-gen-state --state_out=e2e/generated/BasicState ./e2e/protos/basic.proto
scripts.run: yarn run build && concurrently --kill-others "echo 'should start a backend server'" "webpack-dev-server --config ./webpack.js --env.development -d"
